title: Moxie's One Day Bulk Pass Sale!
body: Don't forget, if you swing by the theater today and buy a bulk pass ($50 for 10 tickets), we'll throw in an additional TWO FREE passes. That's 12 tickets for $50, which works out to $4.17 per ticket! This sale is only happening today, so if you miss it you'll have to wait until next year to see another deal this good! We'll be open till 10:30 tonight, so you still have nine hours to make it out here. Good luck!
author: Dan

comments.author: The Four Finger Soc Em
comments.body: Wait, why Derek? As a Christmas present for someone?

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body: For those rare occasions when I come to the Moxie and I'm not alone (this is extremely rare - I expect the pass to last me at least a year).

comments.author: thewayofthedinosaur
comments.body: I wish i had had the funds to get one of these super duper deals i will just have to buy a bulk pass or two in dec. to hold me thru buy nothing year...kinda cheating i know but MEH!

comments.author: drm00se
comments.body:
Posted By: Girl #2awww....derek pre-bought dates!!
How else am I supposed to get any? (...dates, that is...)

comments.author: suzy
comments.body: thank you very much!  boy oh boy, what a great deal!
